Description: Narrow textile fragment; undyed, plain weave linen cloth; long looped selvedge fringe down one side; other edges ragged.The threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.27 per 10mm and weft 14 per 10mm.
Curator's comments: The fringe is of the same type as those from the Middle Kingdom, hence the dating. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1992]
